articles.description: Autumn Sale and Thanksgiving weekend drove record numbers of gamers to Steam
articles.content: Steam has broken its record for the most concurrent players, with numbers of PC gamers logged into the platform hitting 27,384,959, easily beating the previous all-time peak of 26.9 million (set in A… [+3225 chars]
